message: Don't blue yourself David!

The trans community has been supported in """"everything"""" by a piece of legislature known as the Civil Rights Act, which reflects the line """"All [men] are created equal"""" from our founding fathers. There is *nothing* simple about gender dysphoria, which is the condition that underlies being transgender. Trans people transition because it is a better solution than attempted suicide, which *40%* are driven to. Not much of a """"choice."""" And then on top of it, you would deny them their right to vote. Not just unpatriotic, Annie; we're starting to lean heavily into ignorance on your part, and not just a bit of prejudice.

Love on them, then take them to the shelter in charge of this, with some bags of food and towels if you can. Pics of pets will be up later by the shelters. Kids who have lost everything need to know there is a chance Fido or Fluffy is alive somewhere missing them.

The trump exit is all according to plan. Exactly as the RNC wanted once Jeb and Rubio were gone. I predicted on Facebook before the GOP convention that Trump would stay in until after the convention and then drop out and the RNC would pick the candidate they want. The RNC is behind this. They needed Trump to keep out CRUZ and now with the help of the media they are driving out Trump so they can put in their guy. If he dropped out before the convention, the delegates might have chosen Cruz and they couldn't let that happen. So now the RNC will choose who they want. And everyone will be so relieved it's not Trump, we will all jump on board. When I first said this. I was only about 50% sure it would happen. I was pretty shocked to hear today that there is talk of Trump dropping out and how he might be replaced. But make no mistake, this has been the plan for quite a while. I just can't figure out if Trump is in on it or if he is just a useful idiot.
